description: Check installment status for a shop

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID to proceed your application or successful records of payments

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is a timestamp string of the request. Required to prevent request expiry in 5 minutes

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Use for API authorization. For api_key, visit for realtime use and expires in 4 hours

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shop ID that identifies the shop. Required parameter for accessing shop data

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Authorization key. Used for request verification.

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The request ID of the response

response_fields.name: installment_status
response_fields.description: The installment status for the shop
